website_summaries.verdict: Low-cost model suitable for hobbyists and crafters working with wood, plastic, and textiles rather than glass or metal – and who don’t need high-resolution images.
pros: For the money, this is a decent machine capable of engraving over an area 6.1 x 6.8 inches, and at reasonable speed
It’s best with darker materials – some require a coating to be applied first
Straightforward to use, accepts a wide range of picture formats, and comes with USB cable, thumb drive, and safety goggles
cons: Quality control is variable so accuracy can be poor

customer_reviews.title: Good value...easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: I bought this machine knowing nothing about laser engravers. It serves my purpose well. Was pretty easy to learn after playing with it a while. I was going to have a branding iron made for my logo, but now I can do custom engraving for people I make cutting boards for.
customer_reviews.author: becky j bultema

customer_reviews.title: Love this laser
customer_reviews.text: I love this laser, it is exactly what I need. I had it up and running within a half an hour. Very easy to use and it also accepts my JPEG files from my own artwork including any text format.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Product does not install easily. Can't get it to fully install so only have half of the options to engrave. Not a smooth Lazer job either. Lines are crooked and not crisp if it even finishes the whole project. Several times it did about one third of the picture and then quit lazering.
customer_reviews.author: Todd J Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: TRASH
customer_reviews.text: Trash. Software doesn’t work at all. Only way it will work is by using the usb, and then half the time it starts engraving above where it says it will. Ruined my project you couldn’t pay me to use this.
customer_reviews.author: PassionateReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Results...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed decent at first. Very easy to get started and testing out different materials and settings. Then started producing inconsistent results on flat, uniform materials. Probably going to return...close but not close enough.
customer_reviews.author: J. Conger

customer_reviews.title: Best hobby machine and great product support.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this machine for its offline capability. Would have given it four stars for documentation. For instance, nowhere does it say that a 32gb memory stick is the largest it can handle. Not a problem...just not mentioned. I gave it five stars because of the outstanding support. There is a learning curve. An email address is given for support and I made extensive use of it. Replies were always within 24 hours. The support person is in China and English is not his/her first language. But we were able to communicate effectively. Probably the best product support that I have had the pleasure of using. For hobby use, this machine and vendor is the one to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! I bought another laser prior to this one and it was a headache! This one is reassembled for you (except a few pieces which is easy) and setup is quick. Definitely go with this one, don't waste your time or money on the ones you have to put together yourself. Doesn't look cheaply made like the others as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Comes almost fully assembled(8 screws). Started engraving withing 2 min of assembly. Extremely easy to use. Perfect for small jobs and beginners.
customer_reviews.author: KSB

customer_reviews.title: It is fast, efficient, and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I make wood working items for sale and now offer branding on my cutting boards with this unit. It is fast, efficient, and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the hobbiest
customer_reviews.text: I am a hobby woodworker and the only thing I am sorry about is that I waited so long to get this engraver. It assembled in minutes. I used MS Paint to create a BMP file. I used a laptop connected to the engraver and although the instruction detail could have been more I created my first engraving in less than 15 minutes ( 2 inch by 1.25 inches; with 47% laser power and depth at 10% it took 9 minutes to engrave; in maple plywood it engraved to 0.25 mm; lightly sanded and got very crisp lines). Time will tell on its durability but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Laser Engraver Printer
customer_reviews.text: It produces great etched pictures, has a great range of sizes...the worst thing about it was the software...it was hard for me to understand some of the procedures at first, but I have caught on to most of its operations...It is well built and I hope it will last me for a long time...
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W. Elson

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: This is my first laser engraver. I’m not an instruction reader and even without knowing at all what I was doing I figured it out and was engraving. AFTER reading the instructions on how to focus the laser and taking notes on what laser power and carving depth worked best with certain materials my laser engraving has gotten exponentially better and am completely happy with it! The only bummer is is now it’s starting to act up and if I engrave too far to one side it messes up and sort of distorts the image. With that said I am looking for a new engraver but for the price this thing is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Chase Bradshaw

customer_reviews.title: Connectability
customer_reviews.text: This machine is a great machine when you can connect it. I keep getting a message that the machine is not connected. And when I finally get a connection, to much time has gone by. Something isn't right with the software and the drivers and the ability to connect it. I get it that I am new to the this type of machine but not new to using software and there really isn't anything that would guarantee a connection with ease.
customer_reviews.author: zoomlenz4u

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use / jewellerysky is a great seller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a school's Technology Club; so we needed something that was fairly easy to use, which this unit was. Initially it worked great, and was only used a handful of few times. We started to have issues, then Covid-19 happened. The key thing is that the seller: jewellerysky addressed our concerns, and we are now happy. As a user's tip, we found this engraver does best with less complicated, or less pix-elated pictures.
customer_reviews.author: PurpleSerenity95

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: I love the laser cutter. The software... Not so much. It is not difficult to use but there are minimal app selections. I feel like you should be able to do more in the software but there are ways around it. You could use editing software and save the files as jpeg or other picture file. Once complete, just use it in the machine’s software.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough.
customer_reviews.text: This was my first laser engraver. Works well and fulfills my purpose. A few things though: 1. to use it without a computer/laptop is tricky. Not sure how to do it yet. I can't even figure out what image types work in actual use. With laptop connected, it works fairly well. 2. The software is like something from the 80's.
customer_reviews.author: K. lee

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: If you are buying a Laser Engraving machine don't buy this piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Burl Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Glad I decided to purchase this one.
customer_reviews.text: This laser engraver is as easy to use as it says. I am very pleased with it, I have made name plates for my daughters friends and I even cut out a stencil from hard cardboard to paint my mailbox. The software has crashed a few times while setting up a project but has never failed once running. I have found that the unit is portable enough and the focal length allows you to set up the unit on a large project and complete it in sections.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Pante

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Decent machine with good accuracy. However, the software with it is absolute garbage. Constantly crashes, isn't repeatable and lacks even the most basic features. The machine is also not compatible with any other software available. Absolutely would not recommend based on this. Unusable junk.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Anderegg

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had of known about this machine years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t realize I took the manual out the box and two days later I assemble it without instructions. Installed software and began working right away! Only thing I’m having trouble with is figuring out what settings to put it on to engrave. Trying to engrave my son’s track medals and I’m stuck. A depth list would be awesome! Other than that I’m about to make lots of money lol
customer_reviews.author: R. Clayborn

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Grey scale? not so much. The software is pretty good, useful buttons like inverse B/W, rotate, resize, outline, enter text.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: I could not ask for a better machine. Set up is a breeze, program works great (could use a bit of an upgrade though), laser works like a charm (a bit slow on big items). Overall, easy to use for a first time user/personal user.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Won't do text
customer_reviews.text: It does pretty well on pictures. Texting is another story. I never could get the machine to draw script. All the text would disappear into a small white box on the upper left corner. Sometimes I could
customer_reviews.author: Lee J Walker

customer_reviews.title: It’s a decent laser engraver for the money
customer_reviews.text: It’s the most reliable laser engraver I have used and I’ve bought a couple. It’s not perfect but the seller is good with help and communication. The software is painful but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffery

customer_reviews.title: Produces clean logos for my wood and leather work
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to personalize my wood and leather work. Although the instructions are somewhat vague, it was fairly intuitive to use. I use Photoshop Elements to create the artwork and then convert to bmp files and import into the printer software. I run the software straight from the provided thumb drive because I can’t figure out how to install it onto my laptop. I have been very happy with the results on my work. It’s very clean but can be a little slow to engrave. I’m still playing with the settings.
customer_reviews.author: Joe B.

customer_reviews.title: easy to setup and use right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: This product is so easy to use and to have fun with. Assembly was easy and quick and I had no problems figuring it out. The user manual took about 10 mins to read through while I was playing with the engraver. It can be used with or with out a computer and everything you need comes in the box. I would however recommend that you buy a good set of laser goggles that are meant to shield your eyes for the proper wavelength of the laser 400-460NM.
customer_reviews.author: D.Bark

customer_reviews.title: Could get the software to align the unit
customer_reviews.text: I had tried each of the heads. I could not make the unit engrave or print in 3D. The heads would not align. The sales people were no help and sent me another one. It had the same exact issue.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel M.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I got it for my husband for our anniversary for his wood working projects. Setup was fast and easy and he already tried out one of the designs the machine came with (a cute little hello kitty). Excited to see him use it for his projects!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Great starter engraver
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to get started even with the vague directions. This is a great piece of equipement to get started with and has worked fine for me. Few glitches here and there but otherwise would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DeeH

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money. Goes together easily and was engraving in 10 minutes. Overall, better than I was expecting for the price. The software comes on an included thumb drive and it has a USB connector for the computer. You can print from the computer or from the thumb drive.
customer_reviews.author: Ray LaMonica

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The level of detail from a “cheap” machine is great I was expecting a very mediocre machine for the price however it has surpassed my expectations. Super easy to use and set up drag and drop images and start. The only thing I dislike is the amount of software crashes it tends to crash every single time I use it at least twice and that can really get you out of the groove when trying to center something perfectly or get the correct font you want.
customer_reviews.author: Blake Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It has worked amazing! The software could be better and most of the time I have to use my laptop to set up something, but for the $ this can do what you want and well!!
customer_reviews.author: AllysonZ

customer_reviews.title: Ease of Use
customer_reviews.text: Machine is very simple to use, I issues with the software on the computer being able to talk to the laser engraver. Found some other software that seemed to worked but with fewer options. Would of given it a 5 if the software worked properly. Felt satisfied with the price paid and the product it produces. Well get some photos added as the lines are very crisp when using wood as your project material.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This laser engraver has been great. It's easy to use. The only thing I wish is the software could be better but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use-Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I've had this engraver for a few months. It was easy to set up and use. Great product for small projects. Also, the customer service was great. I misplaced the thumb drive with the application on it. I contacted the company via email and received a response within a couple hours. I had my issued resolved the same day.
customer_reviews.author: B. Garr

customer_reviews.title: Great machine and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great machine and worth the money. The software isn’t really user friendly and takes some time to get the hang of. There isn’t an iOS version for some reason even though all their YouTube videos show iOS. Use the machine outside or with an air filtration unit.
customer_reviews.author: The dude 2345

customer_reviews.title: Excellent engraver!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent engraver! Easy to use software, both for Windows and Mac. Portable and good size, you can adjust the depth of the laser. Also great customer service, Jane was able to give me the right software for my Mac and responded me the same day I emailed her.
customer_reviews.author: DMC

customer_reviews.title: Its a good machine who can do little jobs for one of a kind.
customer_reviews.text: Good machine for carving wood, paper, leather, some fabric, some rubber foam too. But not on metal or glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.text: Fine for small projects that are done every once in a while. Not fast by any means. Is not very good for plastic as it causes overlapping melt spots.
customer_reviews.author: RGonz

customer_reviews.title: Great value and does an amazing job!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to create customized ornaments and momento items for craft shows. It went together easily. Learning the best settings for what I wanted to create was a little bit harder and required a few test pieces before I sorted it out.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tool in my shop
customer_reviews.text: Great machine once you learn how to use it and you must be computer savoy ( which I am not) in order to get to get the best results. Had plenty of help learning to use it and still learning. No regrets would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Fred W. Earhart

customer_reviews.title: Powerful small machine!
customer_reviews.text: The setup and use was extremely easy!! I have been very impressed by the power from this laser. I did not expect this much power from this unit! A list of power & depth settings would be incredibly useful to start out. Overall very satisfied with this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and use!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, the assembly was very easy, and I was working on a test piece in less than a half hour. I added a picture of my first project that I had completed only having the laser cutter for a day. Easy instructions and everything want smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique L. Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Once up runs great
customer_reviews.text: Once we got things going all was great. Instructions for installing the software are not very clear and the illustrations indicating what things are and do are described in Chinese in the captions. Love the results after the learning curve.
customer_reviews.author: Whiskey359

customer_reviews.title: Happy softw needs work
customer_reviews.text: Its a very nice engraver for plastic leather and light materials. It works great software needs improvement i use it via my computer have not been able to use just the machine. Due to types of files supported for graphics i do recomend it
customer_reviews.author: jose v trevino

customer_reviews.title: Even a 70+ old lady can use this easily.
customer_reviews.text: Love this engraver. Set it up in about 30 minutes. The instructions are a little iffy but informative enough (with pictures) to use with ease. Using it for Christmas Ornaments for now but can think of many uses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Starting Laser Engraver
customer_reviews.text: I've enjoyed this engraver! Just make sure that you have good ventilation
customer_reviews.author: Jeb Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Complicated and did not engrave on plastic properly.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty complicated to use, and did not do the job for me to engrave on plastic properly. Keep in mind
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: software isuues
customer_reviews.text: if someone can help me figure out the issue I will change the review it was woking great and then all of the sudden the software stopped...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes forever to finish a job!
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice engraver, BUT it takes forever to finish a job. Is there a faster laser? This one is a 3000!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse marroquin

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to assemble and use. I’ve tried others that were complicated to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: mike t.

customer_reviews.title: Good and easy
customer_reviews.text: Had the item working within an hour. Easy setup and working. Can be used for both printing and carving.
customer_reviews.author: Karina Oudal

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it had to learn how to engrave at first. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabby
